definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: white linen (deriv. unknown) pl. [[בַּדִּים]]—[[אֵפוֹד בָָּד]] 1Sa 2:18 (Samuel), 1Sa 22:18 (priests of Nob), 2Sa 6:14 = 1Ch 15:27 (David): in P as material of diff. priestly vestments Ex 28:42, Ex 39:28, Le 6:3, Le 6:3, Le 16:4, Le 16:4, Le 16:4, Le 16:4, Le 16:23, Le 16:32. Pl. [[בַּדִּים]]([[הַ]])[[לבושׁ ]]([[ה]]) clad in (the) linen garments, of angel Ez Eze 9:2, Eze 9:3, Eze 9:11, Eze 10:2, Eze 10:6, Eze 10:7, Da 10:5, Da 12:6, Da 12:7.
